speaker.name: Julien Jerphanion
speaker.biography:
I am mainly interested in computational, algorithmic and mathematical methods. I first started to contribute to open-source in 2017 and since then my contributions focused on scientific software.

Since April 2021, I work at Inria as a Research Software Engineer, mainly on improving performances of scikit-learn. I became one of scikit-learn maintainers in October 2021.
